# Government Tender Announcement

## W0114-220009 Computer Numerical Control (CNC) Lathe

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Mechanical and Aerospace Engineering (MAE) at the Royal Military College of Canada (RMC) has published a tender announcement for the procurement of a new Computer Numerical Control (CNC) lathe.

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: WS3732442254-Doc3744767582
* **Amendment Number**: 0
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3732442254
* **Publication Date**: November 10, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 7, 2022 (14:00:00 Eastern Standard Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: December 31, 2022
* **Expected Contract End Date**: May 31, 2024

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category**: Goods (G)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Multiple trade agreements applicable

### Delivery and Contact Information

* **Regions of Delivery**: Kingston, Ontario
* **Contact Person**: Mike Littlefield, PSPC/SPAC
* **Contact Email**: [mike.littlefield@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:mike.littlefield@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Technical Description

The Royal Military College of Canada requires a new CNC lathe to support its ongoing projects, as the current machine is outdated and no longer supported by the manufacturer. The new machine will be used for metalworking operations.

## Specifications and Requirements

* **UNSPSC Codes**: 23242300, 23242500, 23242600 (Lathes and turning centers, metal milling machines, and specialized or miscellaneous metal cutting machines)
* **Deliverables**: The tender requirements also include a complete list of deliverables, which must be received on or before March 31, 2023.
